    • loadSettings

      public Settings loadSettings(String userId)
      Loads settings for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose settings to load
      Returns:
      The user's settings, or null if not found

    • saveSettings

      public boolean saveSettings(Settings settings)
      Saves settings for a user.
      Parameters:
      settings - The settings to save
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • applyDarkMode

      public boolean applyDarkMode(boolean darkMode, String userId)
      Applies dark mode setting.
      Parameters:
      darkMode - true to enable dark mode, false to disable
      userId - The ID of the user whose setting to update
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • applyResolution

      public boolean applyResolution(String resolution, String userId)
      Applies resolution setting.
      Parameters:
      resolution - The new resolution to apply
      userId - The ID of the user whose setting to update
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise
